web.organizations.no_organizations_descr.en: Organizations provide unified billing and administration. Get started by creating your first organization.
web.organizations.no_organizations_descr.translation: Ka taea e ngā whakahaere te whakahaere i ngā rōpū maha me te utu me te whakahaere kotahi. Tīmata mā te waihanga i tō whakahaere tuatahi.

web.organizations.create_organization_de.translation: Waihanga i tētahi whakahaere hou hei rōpū i ō rōpū

web.organizations.contact_email_help.en: Primary contact for billing and administrative notifications
web.organizations.contact_email_help.translation: Whakapā matua mō te utu me ngā whakamōhio whakahaere

web.organizations.billing_managed_by_def.en: Billing and subscription management is handled through your primary workspace. Visit your main workspace settings to manage payment methods and invoices.
web.organizations.billing_managed_by_def.translation: Ka whakahaerehia te utu me te whakahaere ohaurunga mā tō wāhi mahi matua. Torohia ngā tautuhinga wāhi mahi matua hei whakahaere i ngā tikanga utu me ngā nama.

web.organizations.switcher_locked.en: Organization switching not available on this page
web.organizations.switcher_locked.translation: Kāore te whakawhiti whakahaere i tēnei whārangi

web.organizations.organization_settings_.en: Update your organization name and description
web.organizations.organization_settings_.translation: Whakahou i tō ingoa whakahaere me te whakamārama

web.organizations.billing_coming_soon.translation: Ka Tae Mai te Honohononga Utu

web.organizations.billing_coming_soon_de.en: Unified billing and subscription management will be available in a future release.
web.organizations.billing_coming_soon_de.translation: Ka wātea te whakahaere utu me te ohaurunga kotahi mō ngā rōpū katoa i roto i tēnei whakahaere i tētahi putanga ā muri ake.

web.organizations.about_description.en: Organizations provide unified billing and administration for centralized management.
web.organizations.about_description.translation: Ka whakarato ngā whakahaere i te utu me te whakahaere kotahi mō ngā rōpū maha. He kōwhiringa - ka taea e ngā rōpū te noho motuhake, te rōpū rānei i raro i tētahi whakahaere mō te whakahaere pokapū.

web.organizations.single_user_info_descr.en: Update your company name and organization details here. This information helps personalize your account and can be used for branding features in the future.
web.organizations.single_user_info_descr.translation: Whakahou i tō ingoa kamupene me ngā taipitopito whakahaere ki konei. Ka āwhina ēnei mōhiohio ki te whakamana i tō pūkete, ka taea hoki te whakamahi mō ngā āhuatanga waitohu ā muri ake.

web.organizations.getting_started_descri.en: Create your first organization to manage your company information and prepare for future branding features.
web.organizations.getting_started_descri.translation: Waihanga i tō whakahaere tuatahi hei whakahaere i ngā mōhiohio kamupene me te whakareri mō ngā āhuatanga mahi tahi rōpū me te waitohu ā muri ake.

web.organizations.page_description.en: Manage your organizations and team members
web.organizations.page_description.translation: Whakahaere i ō whakahaere me ngā mema rōpū

web.organizations.delete_organization_wa.en: This will permanently delete the organization. This action cannot be undone.
web.organizations.delete_organization_wa.translation: Ka mukua pūmautia e tēnei te whakahaere me ngā rōpū hono katoa. Kāore tēnei mahi e taea te whakakore.

web.organizations.delete_organization_co.en: Are you sure you want to delete {name}? This action cannot be undone.
web.organizations.delete_organization_co.translation: E tino hiahia ana koe ki te muku i {name}? Kāore tēnei mahi e taea te whakakore.

web.organizations.members.description.en: Manage organization members and their roles
web.organizations.members.description.translation: Whakahaere i ngā mema whakahaere me ō rātou tūranga

web.organizations.members.no_members.en: No members yet. Invite team members to get started.

web.organizations.members.no_members_des.en: This organization has no members yet.
web.organizations.members.no_members_des.translation: Kāore anō he mema o tēnei whakahaere.

web.organizations.members.role_updated.translation: Kua whakahoutia angituhia te tūranga mema

web.organizations.members.role_update_er.translation: I rahua te whakahou tūranga mema

web.organizations.members.member_removed.translation: Kua tangohia te mema mai i te whakahaere

web.organizations.members.remove_member_.en: Are you sure you want to remove {name} from this organization?
web.organizations.members.remove_member_.translation: E tino hiahia ana koe ki te tango i a {name} mai i tēnei whakahaere?

web.organizations.members.cannot_change_.en: You cannot change your own role
web.organizations.members.cannot_change_.translation: Kāore e taea e koe te huri i tō ake tūranga

web.organizations.members.cannot_remove_.en: You cannot remove yourself from the organization
web.organizations.members.cannot_remove_.translation: Kāore e taea e koe te tango i a koe anō mai i te whakahaere

web.organizations.members.cannot_remove_.en: You cannot remove the organization owner
web.organizations.members.cannot_remove_.translation: Kāore e taea e koe te tango i te kaipupuri o te whakahaere

web.organizations.members.insufficient_p.en: You do not have permission to manage members
web.organizations.members.insufficient_p.translation: Kāore koe i te mana ki te whakahaere mema

web.organizations.members.role_descripti.en: Full access to all organization settings and members
web.organizations.members.role_descripti.translation: Urunga katoa ki ngā tautuhinga me ngā mema whakahaere katoa

web.organizations.members.role_descripti.en: Can manage members and most organization settings
web.organizations.members.role_descripti.translation: Ka taea te whakahaere i ngā mema me te nuinga o ngā tautuhinga whakahaere
Urunga taketake ki ngā rauemi whakahaere

web.organizations.invitations.no_pending.translation: Kāore he pōwhiri kei te tatari

web.organizations.invitations.resend_suc.translation: Kua tukuna anō angituhia te pōwhiri

web.organizations.invitations.resend_err.translation: I rahua te tuku anō pōwhiri

web.organizations.invitations.you_are_in.translation: Kua pōwhiritia koe ki te hono ki

web.organizations.invitations.accept_suc.translation: Kua whakaae angituhia ki te pōwhiri

web.organizations.invitations.accept_err.translation: I rahua te whakaae ki te pōwhiri

web.organizations.invitations.decline_er.translation: I rahua te whakakāhore i te pōwhiri

web.organizations.invitations.invalid_to.translation: He muhu te pōwhiri, kua pau rānei

web.organizations.invitations.must_sign_.en: Please sign in to accept this invitation
web.organizations.invitations.must_sign_.translation: Tēnā takiuru ki te whakaae ki tēnei pōwhiri

web.organizations.invitations.loading_in.translation: Kei te uta ngā taipitopito pōwhiri

web.organizations.invitations.upgrade_to.en: Upgrade your plan to invite team members

web.organizations.invitations.upgrade_pr.en: Team member invitations require a plan with team management. Upgrade to add collaborators to your organization.
